paper_abstract: A rational spline based on function values only was constructed in the authors' earlier works. This paper deals with the properties of the interpolation and the local control of the interpolant curves. The methods of value control, convex control and inflection-point control of the interpolation at a point are developed. Some numerical examples are given to illustrate these methods. (C) 2009 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Local control of interpolating rational cubic spline curves
